Posts.Content: Feb 7, 2009 10:31PM luvmymom1946 wrote: Hi,Amber  I just read your post and believe me when I tell you. You are no burden to your family. As a daughter that  her mom is suffering breast cancer stage IV can tell you.  I have never seen my mom as a burden.   Yes, it get hard sometime but, people get sick.    The only advice I can give you is  read the bible and go to church.. Seek the Lord.   I will pray for you and your lovely family Mayra
Posts.Title: I am ready to quit.... mrs_X_Sunneedazee lovinmomma
